text:
When I process the FOP to translate a large amount of data that in XML to PDF. 
it would break and response Out of Memory Exception. I had try in java option 
like -Xms40m and -Xmx80m to do again,but still not work. Some one can tell me 
how to do it. If it is a limitation of current FOP ? Thanks for any advise 
about it..
Jackie from Taiwan 2004/07/28 
P.S. if I reduce the amount of data it work.
creator: hsu@mail.newimage.com.tw
bowditch_chris@hotmail.com
text:
This isnt a bug, you are simply trying to process too much data within the 
given memory constraints. Please ask user related questions on the FOP user 
list, where you will get a speedy response to questions:

http://xml.apache.org/fop/maillist.html#fop-user

There are a few tips on how to resolve memory issues on the web site, see:

http://xml.apache.org/fop/running.html#memory
batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
